definition: Belgium/Belgian/abbr. for 比利時|比利时[Bi3 li4 shi2]
to compare/(followed by a noun and adjective) more {adj.} than {noun}/ratio/to gesture/(Taiwan pr. [bi4] in some compounds derived from Classical Chinese)

sentences.english: For men, the most-ordered item is burgers, followed by french fries and pizza.
sentences.chinese: 男性點的最多的是漢堡，其次是薯條和比薩餅。

sentences.english: The school canteen provides hamburgers, sandwiches, pizza and so on.
sentences.chinese: 學校食堂提供漢堡，三明治，比薩餅等等。

sentences.english: The pizza was quartered into six pieces.
I'm wondering whether you could come over for a pizza sometime next week?
sentences.chinese: 我想知道你下週什麼時候是否能過來喫比薩餅？

sentences.english: Even so, pizza's roots go back to the antediluvian times.
sentences.chinese: 但即使如此，比薩餅的根源可追溯至古老的時代。

sentences.english: You can put a lot of different pizza toppings on a pizza base.
sentences.chinese: 你可以在比薩餅底襯上加不同的頂配料。

sentences.english: The prisoners' favorites included meat Kebab and pizza, the official said.
sentences.chinese: 據稱囚犯們最喜歡的外賣是羊肉串和比薩餅。

sentences.english: Only in Amercia can a pizza get to your house faster than an ambulance.
sentences.chinese: 只有在美國，比薩餅能比救護車更快地到達你的門口。

sentences.english: Do you have any pizzas on sale today?
I'd like to have a big slice of pizza and a blueberry ice cream.
sentences.chinese: 我來一大塊比薩餅，再要一份烏飯樹漿果冰淇淋。

sentences.english: We decide to go get a carry-out pizza for dinner.
sentences.chinese: 我們決定買一個比薩餅帶回去作爲晚餐。

sentences.english: B: OK, loser buys pizza tomorrow night.
sentences.chinese: 好，輸的人明天晚上請客喫比薩餅。

sentences.english: You can use it to blot a teaspoon of fat off a pizza slice.
sentences.chinese: 您可以用它來吸乾比薩餅中一茶匙的脂肪。

sentences.english: No one could imagine eating a piece of pizza without a taste of Oregano added to it.
sentences.chinese: 沒有人能想象喫一塊比薩餅沒有味道的牛至添加到它。

sentences.english: But, yesterday, I was so happy that I had a piece after all," said Steffen.
sentences.chinese: 昨天，我很高興，我還是喫一塊比薩餅。

sentences.english: Thai food, or pizza, or whatever you want.
sentences.chinese: 泰國菜，或者比薩餅，隨你喜歡。
